text:
This Chapter shall be known as the Residential Hotel Mail Receptacle Ordinance. For purposes of this Chapter, the terms "owner," "permanent resident," "residential hotel," and "residential unit" shall have the same meaning as those set forth in Administrative Code Sections 
41.4(m), (n), (p), and (q), respectively. 
(Added by Ord. 73-06, File No. 060188, App. 4/20/2006)
